title: Ensure autoplay library background video on landing page

requirements.text: In frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx, ensure the hero section contains an autoplaying, muted, looping <video> element that plays a library scene video. The video element must be absolutely positioned to fill the entire hero section (w-full h-full object-cover), placed behind all hero content via z-index layering. A semi-transparent dark overlay must sit between the video and the hero text content to preserve text readability. The video source must reference frontend/public/assets/generated/library-hero-bg.mp4. Set autoPlay, muted, loop, and playsInline attributes on the video element. If the video cannot play, the existing hero background image must serve as a fallback via the <video> poster attribute. All existing hero text, CTA buttons, and other content must remain fully visible and functional above the video.

acceptanceCriteria: Opening the landing page immediately begins playing a library video in the hero section background without requiring user interaction.
The video plays automatically, is muted, loops continuously, and fills the full hero section with object-cover sizing.
The video is layered behind all hero text and CTA buttons, which remain readable and clickable.
A semi-transparent dark overlay is visible between the video and the hero content.
On browsers where autoplay is blocked or the video fails to load, the hero background image is shown as a fallback.

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
All changes must be confined to frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx and the static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/library-hero-bg.mp4.
The video must not have audio that plays automatically; the muted attribute is required.
nonGoals: Adding video playback to any page other than the landing page hero section.
Implementing a video upload or management feature in the admin dashboard.
Changing any backend logic or data models.
Modifying the login, signup, student dashboard, or admin dashboard pages.
